SAMLAuthenticationStatementFacade
public class SAMLAuthenticationStatementFacadeImpl
extends Object
implements SAMLAuthenticationStatementFacade

Implementation of SAMLAuthenticationStatementFacade that stores the optional signing and trusted credentials.

buildAuthenticationStatement

public String buildAuthenticationStatement(String identity,
                                           String issuer,
                                           boolean signit)
                                    throws Exception
Method to generate a SAML authentication statement.

Specified by:
buildAuthenticationStatement in interface SAMLAuthenticationStatementFacade
Parameters:
identity - : the identity asserted in the SAML statement.
issuer - : the issuer of the SAML statement.
signit - : true to digitally sign the statement (requires signing credential).
Returns:
: the SAML authentication statement serialized as a string.
Throws:
Exception

parseAuthenticationStatement

public String parseAuthenticationStatement(String xml,
                                           boolean validate)
                                    throws SAMLInvalidStatementException
Method to process a SAML authentication statement and extracted the asserted identity.

Specified by:
parseAuthenticationStatement in interface SAMLAuthenticationStatementFacade
Parameters:
xml - : the SAML authentication statement serialized as a string.
validate - : true to validate the statement signature (requires a set of trusted credentials).
Returns:
: the asserted identity.
Throws:
SAMLInvalidStatementException - : if the SAML statement did not validate.
